en.header: How can you make sure your media monitoring is effective?
en.klf: To get the best out of media monitoring, you need to have clear and precise objectives so the information you receive is relevant and targeted. If you don’t have clear objectives, you can end up feeling completely overwhelmed when you end up with huge quantities of potentially useful information and you don’t know where to start.
en.tips: Objectives act as cognitive filters. You then see the wealth of information through that filter and reduce the volume you’re working with.
en.clue: Don’t bite off more than you can chew.
